content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column]

Kamgrad - synonym for quality construction For more than four decades, we have built knowledge, experience, top materials and state-of-the-art technological achievements into each of our projects. Kamgrad - synonym for quality construction For more than four decades, we have built knowledge, experience, top materials and state-of-the-art technological achievements into each of our projects. [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” el_class=”position-relative box-shadow col4gray-border mt-minus100″ css=”.vc_custom_1653639579160{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1653980773778{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-right-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

REFERENCES

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Numerous implemented and completed projects throughout Croatia serve as proof to our experience and proof of quality…[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1653980783367{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-right-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

SUPPLIERS AND SUBCONTRACTORS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Joint development and sharing of experience are a prerequisite for any successful aprtnership or cooperation. Trust between business associates knows no compromise…[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1653980793665{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-right-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

KAMGRAD GROUP

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Through various projects, the Kamgrad Group is present throughout Croatia, and has also expanded its operations abroad through Kamgrad Group companies…[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Learn more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1653980802830{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;background-color: #b1191d !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

WE ARE HIRING

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

If you want to prove yourself on the most challenging projects in the No. 1 construction company in Croatia, please review open tenders or send us an open application.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Learn more

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1653652928611{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” el_class=”mt-lg-5 mb-lg-5 home-about-us py-5″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ css=”.vc_custom_1653652868075{padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”pt-0 order-2 order-lg-1″][vc_single_image image=”49″ img_size=”full” el_class=”d-lg-none”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”right-to-left” css=”.vc_custom_1653652991524{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”p-lg-5 bg-white-95 order-1 order-lg-2″][vc_column_text]

Kamgrad is Croatia’s leading construction company

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We have specialised in high-rise construction, and with continuous organic growth and positive business from our establishment to the present, we have strengthened our leading position.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]40 years of experience and knowledge of our 750 employees have been incorporated into all our business and housing projects, and each new project is approached professionally – respecting the agreed deadlines, using state-of-the-art materials and state-of-the-art technological achievements.

Our quality construction and long-term reliability have been recognized not only on the Croatian market, but also on German, Swedish and Serbian markets. So far, we have successfully and in time of the agreed deadlines realized over 400 projects, the most important of which are the construction of the Zagreb, Split and Dubrovnik airports, the construction of the Park Hotel in Rovinj and Poreč, the construction of the Valamar Isabella resort and the Matrix Office Park in Zagreb and the reconstruction of the rotor in Zagreb.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1653968742694{background-image: url(https://www.kamgrad.hr/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/kamgrad-background-02.jpg?id=93) !important;}” el_class=”bg-cover bg-center pt-lg-5 pb-5″][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”justify-content-end col-6-container-width-in-full-screen py-5″ css=”.vc_custom_1653640069451{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

We’re a human-oriented company.

Both in and outside Kamgrad.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Our vision

To remain a reliable partner in building modern solutions for life.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Our mission

We create for you, we build a world around us.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Our values

Reliability, collegiality and resourcefulness.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ el_class=”pb-5 pb-lg-0 pt-md-5 pt-lg-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1653968984205{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Reliability

One of our most important values is to nurture continuous business excellence and quality through reliable actions.

Collegiality

People, co-operation and partnership are a precondition and basis for our made success. We help others solve problems and respect the diversity of opinions.

Resourcefulness

In order to adequately respond to the increasingly demanding challenges of the modern market, we bring fast and effective solutions in a dynamic environment.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1653982585951{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}” el_class=”mb-lg-5″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Current projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Numerous implemented and completed projects throughout Croatia serve as proof to our experience and proof of quality. We are currently undergoing contrustions on several locations and these are some of our current projects.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Construction of the residential and business complex RIO – Kantrida – Rijeka

Construction of the EL-TO – Zagreb business building

Construction of the business building GTC Matrix, Object C – Zagreb

Construction of the new KBC Rijeka block

Construction Petram resorta – Savudrija

Construction Grand Hotela View – Otok Brač

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

News

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”mb-5″][vc_column]

The Golden Kuna for life’s work

We congratulate our owner, mr. Dragutin Kamenski on receiving the Golden Kuna award for life’s work, awarded by the Croatian…

Saznaj više

Conference of women in construction work

Conference of “Women in construction, architecture and related industries” without female employess from Kamgrad. Tajana Petljak was first to present…

Saznaj više

Kamgrad’s Health and Sports day

Yesterday, in cooperation with our partner MultiSport Benefit systems Croatia, we held the traditional Kamgrad’s Health and Sports day which…

Saznaj više

Socializing at the second GRADify business fair

On Saturday, May 7 th, we were meeting with future engineers and construction engineers at the second business fair GRADify,…

Saznaj više

Druženje na drugom sajmu poslova GRADify

U subotu, 07. svibnja družili smo se sa budućim inženjerima i inženjerkama građevine na drugom sajmu poslova GRADify, Faculty of…

Saznaj više

Kamgradov Dan zdravlja i sporta

Jučer smo, u suradnji sa našim partnerom MultiSport Benefit Systems Hrvatska održali već tradicionalni Kamgradov Dan zdravlja i sporta koji…

Saznaj više

Konferencija žene u građevini

Konferencija Žene u građevini, arhitekturi i srodnim industrijama nije prošla bez naših Kamgradovki. Tajana Petljak je probila led s prvim izlaganjem…

Saznaj više

Zlatna kuna za životno djelo

Našem vlasniku g. Dragutinu Kamenskom čestitamo na primitku nagrade Zlatna kuna za životno djelo, a koju Hrvatska gospodarska komora dodjeljuje…

Saznaj više
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1653980843239{padding-top: 40px !important;background-image: url(https://www.kamgrad.hr/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/kamgrad-background-01.jpg?id=94) !important;}” el_class=”pb-0 pb-lg-5″][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Contact us

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-2 order-sm-1 py-3 pb-0 pb-sm-3″ width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1653483522916{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text]
